name: RoboFight
description:
RoboFight

RoboFight is a  platformer, set in a ruined 2d factory. 

Controls

Player 1

  • A,D for movement;
  • W for jump;
  • Space for attack;

Player 2

  • left, right for movement;
  • up for jump;
  • Space for attack;
Credits:

Design, Art, Code by Kerem Karacalar
